description: Rewrote the app into TypeScript. This should improve stability and reduce regressions.
Rewrote the app to utilize Next.js for improved page load speeds.
Please report any bugs you find to the GitHub repo.

version: v0.11.1 - Chest Cleanup and Bug Fixes
description: Added Snowboar King (Dragonspine Boss)
Added Illumiscreen (Liyue Event)
Sorted 142 Chests from Common Chests (Dragonspine) based on rarity in Chinese description.
Fixed bug preventing 'Clear Refreshed Markers' from working.
Various other fixes.
Added new Sync tab, which includes an AppSample importer.
Editor: Holding CTRL while placing markers allows you to quickly place more.
Editor: Holding CTRL while clicking the end of a route allows you to extend it.
Cleaned up positions of various markers (such as Teleporters).
Added locations for Geovishaps.
Various fixes.
@specklet: Added new images and descriptions for 13 chests around Stormbearer Point.
Hid the AppSample and MapGenie importers (they're WIP for now).
Bug fixes.
Added a changelog view to the Help tab.
Made improvements to the crash reporter to help diagnose issues.
@Alkmaaar: Added Russian translations from several languages.
@xRitax: Translated Andrius to Japanese.
@luanvilarim: Translated many features to Portuguese.
Fixed a bug which prevented the page from rendering.
Majorly revamped how markers are stored.
Imported over 2,500 markers from Yuanshen.site.
Added text descriptions and video embeds to all Crimson Agate markers.
Added the ability to navigate to markers via hyperlink.
